function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 in sewage waters","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus to the general population","Mitigation":"Improved wastewater treatment, public awareness, and sanitation measures","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, public health campaigns, and sanitation infrastructure","People":"General population","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Complicated sample handling in the laboratory for PCR testing","Impact":"Delays in identifying COVID-19 cases and implementing necessary measures","Mitigation":"Investing in automation and robotics for sample handling, training additional laboratory personnel","Technologies":"Automation and robotics for sample processing, laboratory information management systems","People":"Laboratory personnel, healthcare workers, and patients","Owner":"Laboratories, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Effectiveness of current disinfection technologies on treating the virus","Impact":"Risk of nosocomial transmission within hospitals","Mitigation":"Evaluation and implementation of advanced disinfection technologies, strict adherence to infection control protocols","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies, UV-C sterilization, ozone treatment, and hydrogen peroxide vaporization","People":"Medical doctors, hospital personnel, and patients","Owner":"Hospital management, infection control teams"}]}
